title: Moonlight
description: This 1st Print Edition is superceded by the Revised 3rd Print Edition, available   amazon.com/Moonlight-Pact-Arcanum-Ars...The third book in the vampire series Pact Arcanum , this sequel to Sunset charts the next chapter in the war between the supernatural races.Washington, DC, 2042.One Sentinel must guard the life of a future leader of his race of mystical warriors in their battle against the vampires.To survive, the two must match wits with both the enemy they know, and a new menace arising from the virtual world."Seat belts are strongly recommended for this supernaturally charged literary roller-coaster ride."--Kirkus Indie Reviews For more details about Arshad, to read the full reviews, or to sign up for the newsletter, check out the author's website at pactarcanum.com .Search on " Pact Arcanum " to find all the books in the series.
author: Arshad Ahsanuddin
